docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs 中文文档地址：https://markdown-docs-zh.readthedocs.io/zh_CN/latest/ 安装 pip3 。 pip3 --version 最少需要知道得命令： mkdocs new liwei-mkdocs cd liwei-mkdocs mkdocs serve 配置页面格式： site_name: 我的文档 nav: - 主页: 'index.md' - 关于: 'about.md' theme: readthedocs For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: 主页
